config.question: The White Pines Acts were instituted in order to __________.

choices.content: reserve the best trees for the Royal Navy
prevent the importation of pine trees
obtain additional revenues from pine growers
prevent the French merchants from gaining profits

answer_3.response: The White Pines Acts passed in 1711, 1722, and 1729 forbade Americans from cutting white pine trees without a license. The purpose of this legislation was to reserve the best trees for the Royal Navy.
